lines.text: We didn't tell you? We're having a party! We rented out the Adams. Yeah it has this whole 80's theme.
Yeah, so, you can just wear that really ugly shirt you always wear. And... you'll be 80's!
Oh I'd love to. But all my stuff burned down. In the big funny fire!
Do you have a dream you would like me to interpret?
Sorry, I don't sleep. Not to dream, anyway.
Life is too easy in Portland. People aren't tense enough.
